decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - 1.	The structure hereby permitted (excluding the sports pitch) shall be removed on or before 29th October 2022.

Condition : 2 - 2.	The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location Plan, Site Plan, 20_00, 20_01, 20_02, 20_03, 20_06, received 10/05/2017) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - 3.	The dome and sports pitch shall not be used and it's lighting shall be switched off outside of the following times: 8:00am until 10:00pm daily.
Condition : 4 - 4.	The existing floodlighting shall not be used prior to the removal of the dome.
description: Retention of temporary dome previously approved under planning permission 00608/E/P32  including the retention of ancillary plant for a further 5 years.
